name: Smartwool Hike Heavy Heritage Crew Socks - Women's
description: Fully-cushioned hiking socks for maximum shock absorption when wearing stiffer boots and carrying heavy loads. A high percentage of merino wool keeps your feet cool on warm days and is naturally antimicrobial so they resist sock stink after days of wear.Ribbed knit leg construction.Elasticized arch brace helps to keep the sock in place.Flat knit toe seam for comfort.
